wikipedia_page.main: Ann Saunderson (born Ann Karen Joy Nanton in Birmingham) is a British dance music singer.

response: * Ann Saunderson, born Ann Nanton and is a British dance/soul artist.

Surkin released his first album "USA" late 2011,http://www.residentadvisor.net/news.aspx?id=15137 -  Surkin readies debut album, USA which was called by dance magazine Mixmag "one of the most exciting concept albums of the 21st century".Mixmag, December 2011. Album Of The Month "Surkin - USA" The album is influenced by Detroit techno, 80's electro and Chicago House, featuring vocals by Ann Saunderson (from Inner City) and Marshall Jefferson collaborator Kevin Irving.
*2005 "You're Not Alone", as Dave Lee (with Michele Chiavarini and Ann Saunderson)
